modName: Equipment Of Eternal Shine - Elven Overhaul (SortingPatch)
summary: Sorting patch for Equipment Of Eternal Shine - Elven Overhaul by lKocMoHaBTl
descriptionHtml:
[color=2996e2][size=5][center][b]Equipment Of Eternal Shine - Elven Overhaul (SortingPatch)[/b][/center][/size][/color]
[color=2996e2][size=3][b]Requirements:[/b][/size][/color]
The original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17582]Equipment Of Eternal Shine - Elven Overhaul[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2361177]lKocMoHaBTl[/url]

[color=2996e2][size=3][b]About:[/b][/size][/color]
This "Patch" changes all names of the original "Equipment Of Eternal Shine", for better sorting inside the crafting menu. No other alterations where done, i.e. all the credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2361177]lKocMoHaBTl[/url] for his work!

[color=2996e2][size=3][b]Installation with NMM:[/b][/size][/color]
Activate and Overwrite the original ESP.

[color=2996e2][size=3][b]Credits:[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17582]Equipment Of Eternal Shine - Elven Overhaul[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2361177]lKocMoHaBTl[/url] (Original Author)

[color=2996e2][size=3][b]Disclaimer:[/b][/size][/color]
Because i was unable to get a hold of the original author, i published this little patch without permission. If the original author does not aprove of this, i will take down the download as soon as possible. The original author has the right to add this patch to the original release in any form he/she seems fit.
author: lKocMoHaBTl and BrainInBlack
